AcctCheckScript: Welcome to ResumeBuilder! If admin, enter Y. Otherwise, enter N to begin creating your resume:
PasswordScript: Enter admin password to view most recent user:
OverviewScript:
The resume will be organized in the following order:

-Contact
-Summary
-Experience
-Education
-Skills
ContactScript: Enter full name and email separated by a comma for Contact:
SummaryScript: Enter 3 sentences separated by a period that describe your career goals for Summary:
TitleEmpScript: Enter position title and company name separated by a comma:
DutiesScript: Enter your 3 most important job duties separated by a period. Start each statement with an action verb:
DegSchoScript: Enter degree program and school name separated by a comma:
NumScript: Enter the number of items to include in resume for
EndScript: Enter end date (yyyy-mm) or NA if currently at
RNameScript: You are done. Enter the name of your resume:
PDFPathScript:
Would you like to email your resume, donwload it or both?
Enter E for email, D for download or B for both:
SkillsScript: Enter your 3 most marketable skills (soft and hard) separated by a period:
